author: David Ng, David Ng
title: Billionaire David Geffen Mocked for Announcing He’s ‘Avoiding the Virus’ Aboard His Luxury Yacht
description: Billionaire Hollywood mogul and Democrat donor David Geffen notified the world that he is avoiding the coronavirus pandemic by hunkering down aboard his private yacht, Rising Sun, which is sailing somewhere off the coast of the Grenadines in the Caribbean,
content: Billionaire Hollywood mogul and Democrat donor David Geffen notified the world that he is avoiding the coronavirus pandemic by hunkering down aboard his private yacht, Rising Sun, which is sailing somewhere off the coast of the Grenadines in the Caribbean, ac… [+1987 chars]
